name: FunHouse of BlueCapybara
description:
I present to you, a completely fresh original horror game that i made b̶e̶c̶a̶u̶s̶e̶ i̶ w̶a̶n̶t̶e̶d̶ m̶o̶n̶e̶y̶. It has every thing an indie horror has nowadays. colorful mascots and lore! I made this game in 1 day as a joke to poke fun at the state of mascot horror, I'm not saying I dislike mascot horror, i'm merely satirizing it's faults. I actually have my own mascot horror in the works.

Warning: this game is spooky and stuff

Animations from Mixamo

modeling done my Rupture games

coding done my Rupture games

audio from Zapsplat
